official_title: Use of Ambient Lighting During Colonoscopy and Its Effect on Adenoma Detection Rate and Eye Fatigue: a Pilot Study
inclusion_criteria:
* Adults undergoing screening colonoscopy
* Procedure performed by a participating gastroenterologist
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Any diagnostic colonoscopies
* History of colon resection
* History of colorectal cancer
* Children
* Pregnant women
* Prisoners
* Cases involving trainees, including gastroenterology fellows
